name: Lint/UriEscapeUnescape
full_description: `URI.escape` method is obsolete and should not be used. Instead, use `CGI.escape`, `URI.encode_www_form` or `URI.encode_www_form_component` depending on your specific use case. Also `URI.unescape` method is obsolete and should not be used. Instead, use `CGI.unescape`, `URI.decode_www_form` or `URI.decode_www_form_component` depending on your specific use case.
